Sentencas: This paper proposes a 10-kW power conditioning system for a 5-kW solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) low-voltage battery hybrid power generation that has been developed for participation in the 2003 Future Energy Challenge Competition organized by the U.S. Department of Energy and the IEEE.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: The objective of the competition was to develop a fuel cell inverter with minimum requirement for cost of $40/kW and efficiency of 90%.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: The proposed power conditioning system consists of the front-end dc-dc converter, the dc-ac inverter and the bidirectional dc-dc converter.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: Practical issues such as component rating calculation, high-frequency transformer design, heat sink design, and protection are detailed aiming at the cost and efficiency targets.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: A low-cost implementation of controllers is discussed along with current-mode control, output voltage regulation with capacitor balancing and an SOC control for battery management.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: A 10-kW hardware prototype was successfully built and tested in the steady-state as well as in the transient-state.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: Experimental performances are compared to minimum target requirements of the fuel cell inverter.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use

Sentencas: The cost analysis is done based on the spreadsheets evaluation forms provided in the competition.
Titulo: A 10-kW SOFC low-voltage battery hybrid power conditioning system, for residential use
